channel.title: Mercenary's Connections can pardon anyone providing their contract is dead
channel.description:
#### What happened? When I rolled Merc I could use my day ability to pardon a player who was not my contract. This happened the day after my target died.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? According to the tooltip for Connections, the Mercenary should only be able to pardon if the person on trial is their contract. Last time I rolled Mercenary I could still pardon anyone through connections, regardless of who is on trial after my contract died.
#### Steps to reproduce: 1) Roll a Mercenary. 2) Have your contract die. 3) Have a person put up on trial the following day.

item.title: Mercenary's Connections can pardon anyone providing their contract is dead
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
What happened?

When I rolled Merc I could use my day ability to pardon a player who was not my contract. This happened the day after my target died.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

According to the tooltip for Connections, the Mercenary should only be able to pardon if the person on trial is their contract. Last time I rolled Mercenary I could still pardon anyone through connections, regardless of who is on trial after my contract died.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Roll a Mercenary.
  2. Have your contract die.
  3. Have a person put up on trial the following day.
